findings.title: Iterations over lists/batches of tokens could deplete the transaction available gas and cause it to fail
findings.description: The multiple iterations over the same array could be larger than the block limit, causing the transaction to fail due to depletion of available gas.

findings.title: Signature nonce implementation vulnerable to transaction order dependence
findings.description: The signature nonce implementation does not verify the ordering of nonces, allowing relayers to sort user transactions and interfere with their outcome. This also prevents users from burning unsent transactions by sending another one with a higher nonce.
